Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.description: A Tank who specializes against Mages thanks in part to his innate Spell Armor.<n/><n/>20 Spell Armor

basic.name: Discord Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

trait.name: Sadism
trait.shortTooltip: Alarak deals increased damage and has increased self-healing against enemy Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.<n/><n/>Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

level1.name: Sustaining Power
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

level1.name: Extended Lightning
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Sadism, empower Lightning Surge
level1.fullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%.<n/><n/>Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.<n/><n/>Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.<n/><n/>Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.<n/><n/>Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

level4.name: Level4Talent
level4.fullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing 96 damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.<n/><n/>Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

level10.name: Deadly Charge
level10.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
level10.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

level10.name: Counter-Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
level10.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.description: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.
